alert.note: Alert for Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clarke, northwestern Oglethorpe and Madison Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 121 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Neese, or 7 miles southwest of Danielsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danielsville, Comer, Winterville, Colbert, Carlton, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Diamond Hill, Smithonia, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Barretts Mill, Paoli, Neese, Watson Mill Bridge State Park, Vesta, and Point Peter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
